akn:content.akn:p:
§ 6307. Reporting Not later than 48 business hours after the conclusion of a professional boxing match, the supervising boxing commission shall report the results of such boxing match and any related suspensions to each boxer registry. (Pub. L. 104–272, § 8, Oct. 9, 1996, 110 Stat. 3311.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective July 1, 1997, see section 23(2) of Pub. L. 104–272, set out as a note under section 6301 of this title.
